commit.message:
re PR middle-end/38587 (IRA doesn't preserve local variables after setjmp)

2009-01-21  Vladimir Makarov  <vmakarov@redhat.com>

	PR middle-end/38587
	* ira-color.c (coalesce_spill_slots): Don't coalesce allocnos
	crossing setjmps.

From-SVN: r143554

+
+	PR middle-end/38587
+	* ira-color.c (coalesce_spill_slots): Don't coalesce allocnos
+	crossing setjmps.
